= help =

== Format ==
cg help ?options? ?topic?

== Summary ==
display help

== Description ==
cg help displays help about a speific topic, or a general help overview if no topic is given

== Options ==
; **-format 0/1**: if 0 output help as ascii text to stdout; if 1 put in color and output via less

== Arguments ==
; **topic**: display help about this specific topic

== Category ==
Dev
